title: Morrocan harissa chicken salad with pomegranate, orange and sesame
ingredients: ['2 Chicken Breasts', 'Cous Cous', '1 Pomegranate, seeds scooped out and set aside', '3/4 red onion, sliced', '1 small carrot, finely grated', 'fresh coriander', 'fresh mint', '1 level tabs sesame seeds, dry roasted and set aside', 'harissa paste', '1 orange, peel finely grated and set aside, juiced and set aside, and then cut into segments', '2 tsp tahini', '1 tabs runny honey', '1/2 tsp rice vinegar', 'seasoning to taste', 'good pinch cinnamon', 'extra virgin olive oil']
